channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Storms and possible twisters threaten the South just as New Orleans celebrates Mardi Gras
item.description: Powerful storms bearing a threat of tornadoes are expected to punch through Louisiana and other parts of the South on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump to stand before Congress and offer divided nation an accounting of his turbulent first weeks
Texas measles outbreak fueled by distrust in public health and personal choice
